folder: Boston Road & Tremont Avenue (East), Bronx, NY
text:
2022 Boston Road, east side, between East Tremont Ave. and East 178th Street.
About 1925.
W. B. Vernam.

folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
text:
E. Tremont Avenue, east from Boston Road. On the extreme right is E. 177th Street, proceeding east from Devoe Avenue, and to its left is Wyatt Street, running east from Devoe Avenue. Also visible is the elevated structure of the New York, Boston and Westchester Railroad.
May 1926
Brown Brothers
NEG. #3208

folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
text:
E. Tremont Avenue, south side (foregrouund ), east from Boston Road to the Bronx River. Also shown is the New York Coliseumm, on the south side of E. 177tth Street, adjoininog Devoe Avenue. The view is northeastward from the E. 177th Street elevated station of the I.R.T. subway.
May 11, 1938.
P.L. Sperr
NE5 ~ 3205

folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Boston Road, Bronx, NY
text:
E. Tremont Avenue, north side, west from the Bronx River to Boston Road. This is a central meeting point for a number of street car lines of the Third Avenue Street Railway Company. Shown, too, is the Tremont Avenue station of the I. R. T.
Jul. 23, 1940
P. L. Sperr
